advancement.exmachinis.flux_compactor.de: Pesky pieces filling up your storage? Craft a Flux Compactor
advancement.exmachinis.flux_hammer.desc: No more pounding sand! Craft a Flux Hammer
advancement.exmachinis.flux_sieve.desc: Tired of right-clicking? Craft a Flux Sieve
advancement.exmachinis.netherite_upgrade: "No, this is netherite." Craft a Netherite Upgrade
exmachinis.int.jei.category.flux_compact:
The Flux Compactor will take items from the internal inventory,
and place the outputs into an inventory below.

Upgrades can be added to increase the number of items processed at once.

The block can be disabled by a redstone signal.

The output side can be configured by shift + right-clicking with an Ex Nihilo hammer.
exmachinis.int.jei.category.flux_hammer:
The Flux Hammer will take items from an inventory above,
and place the outputs into an inventory in front.

Upgrades can be added to increase the number of items processed at once.

The block can be disabled by a redstone signal.

The output side can be configured by shift + right-clicking with an Ex Nihilo hammer.
exmachinis.int.jei.category.flux_sieve:
The Flux Sieve will take items from the internal inventory,
and place the outputs into an inventory below.

Upgrades can be added to increase the number of items processed at once.

Meshes can be enchanted with Fortune to increase drop chances.

The block can be disabled by a redstone signal.

The output side can be configured by shift + right-clicking with an Ex Nihilo hammer.
